attributes.action: To stop the discrimination towards people who wish to join the armed forces.
attributes.background: To change this Issue is due to the fact that people with high functioning disibilties such as austism, are being turned down from joining the armed forces before having their medical, and physical examinations. This stops any able person from joining the forces because they have a disability.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find a list of the medical conditions that can stop you joining the Army here:

https://apply.army.mod.uk/how-to-join/can-i-join/medical

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
